chairs.name: Gray Fabric Upholstered Chairs
chairs.description: These chairs feature a light gray fabric upholstery and wooden legs. The chairs are placed next to each other, facing the same direction, with a slightly curved backrest and straight armrests. They sit elegantly on a black background.

chairs.name: Yellow Velvet Armchair
chairs.description: This yellow armchair with a wooden frame and black legs exudes style and comfort. Upholstered in luxurious yellow velvet fabric, it features plush cushions and sleek lines for an elegant look.

chairs.name: Brown Upholstered Chairs
chairs.description: This set of two chairs boasts brown upholstery and wooden legs, creating a modern and minimalist design with clean lines and an elegant look. The warm brown fabric upholstery adds warmth and comfort to these chairs, making them suitable for any room.

chairs.name: Yellow Upholstered Chair
chairs.description: A yellow upholstered chair with wooden legs and a curved backrest. This chair features a simple, modern design with light yellow fabric upholstery and elegant wooden legs. Designed for versatility and sophistication.

chairs.name: Gray Armchair
chairs.description: This gray armchair with wooden legs and a round backrest features light gray fabric upholstery. With a simple and modern design, it combines clean lines and a minimalist aesthetic for a comfortable and functional look.

chairs.name: Blue Armchair
chairs.description: This blue armchair with a wooden base and legs features a dark blue fabric upholstery and sleek, modern wooden armrests. Its minimalist and contemporary design adds a touch of sophistication to any space.

chairs.name: Beige Fabric Armchair
chairs.description: This beige fabric armchair features wooden legs and a curved backrest with a buttoned seat cushion. With a minimalist and modern design, it combines comfort and style seamlessly.

sofas.name: White Metal-Leg Sofa
sofas.description: This white sofa features a curved back and legs made of metal. With its simple and modern design, it adds a clean and minimalist touch to your space.

sofas.name: Beige Wooden Frame Sofa
sofas.description: This beige sofa comes with two cushions and a wooden frame. The beige fabric cushions on the seat, backrest, and arms create a simple and elegant design.

sofas.name: Modern Beige Wooden-Leg Sofa
sofas.description: This beige sofa features a wooden frame and legs, offering a modern design with clean lines and a minimalist aesthetic. The firm cushions provide excellent support for your comfort.

sofas.name: White Wooden-Frame Sofa
sofas.description: This white sofa boasts a wooden frame and a cushioned seat and backrest. Its simple and elegant design, combined with the dark wood legs, stands out against a black background.

sofas.name: White Wooden Base Sofa
sofas.description: This white sofa comes with a wooden base and a curved backrest. The minimalist design and neutral color scheme create a modern look.

sofas.name: Beige Minimalist Sofa
sofas.description: This beige sofa with wooden legs and armrests is designed with clean lines and a neutral color scheme. It offers a modern and minimalist look, perfect for various settings.

sofas.name: Beige Wool Fabric Sofa
sofas.description: This beige sofa has a simple and modern design, made from wool fabric. The slightly raised backrest and firm cushions provide a comfortable and inviting look.

sofas.name: Beige Minimalist Wooden-Frame Sofa
sofas.description: This beige sofa features a wooden frame, cushioned seat and backrest, and dark wood legs. The slightly raised backrest adds to the inviting look of the sofa.
